channel.title: How can you get doors to open on 508s
channel.description: I'm here on behalf of Old-Dutch Project 508, and we cannot get a door to open in Yanille. Can someone help us?

item.title: How can you get doors to open on 508s
item.dc:creator: @Stupit Stu
item.description:
@Stupit wrote:

We’ve done this allready, we actually want the door to open so were trying somthing like,
public int doors = -1;
So all doors clicked on will turn in the -1 derection.

Read full topic
item.source: How can you get doors to open on 508s

item.title: How can you get doors to open on 508s
item.dc:creator: @ziplock ziplock
item.description:
@ziplock wrote:

Well, you could use something like this.

	if(p.absX == CORDX && p.absY == CORDY && p.heightLevel == HEIGHT) {
	   p.setCoords(CORDX, CORDY, HEIGHT);
	}

Basically fill in the blank’s, It teleports you to the other side of the door, fill the first cord’s with the cords in front of the door so you have to be in front of the door before it teleports you.

Read full topic
item.source: How can you get doors to open on 508s
